description:
One of PPG’s greatest strengths is the diversity of our people, who represent wide-ranging nationalities, cultures, languages, religions, ethnicities, lifestyles and professional and educational backgrounds. In Australia we have been recognised as an Employer of Choice for Gender Equality two years in a row and are in the process of applying for the citation for a third year. We operate in an industry that is traditionally very male dominated but are making a significant effort to ensure our organisation is a place where everyone can thrive regardless of gender, background, family and caring responsibilities or any other attribute. 

Being part of our team

As a unified global company, we offer boundless opportunities to advance, move laterally, work in different businesses or regions, change functions or flourish in your current role. Our strategy is to build talent from within, fully leveraging the knowledge, expertise and shared relationships of the people who are already part of our team. With our new hire programs, we strive to further leverage our diversity.



We are proud to offer our team members flexible work arrangements, mentoring and career development opportunities. We have an active Women’s Leadership Council which works to advocate on behalf of all the talented women we have in our company through sponsoring, educating, providing networking opportunities and lobbying for policy change to make PPG a better place to work. 


It is not a coincidence that upon joining the PPG world, employees tend to stay with us. We can honestly say we have a great team, a culture built on ethics, safety and integrity. We continue to focus on collaboration, having a great supportive culture where your voice is heard, and new ideas are valued. Our leadership teams are committed to overcoming any biases that might still exist and we have put ambitious targets in place to guide us in reaching the gender balance we are aiming for at all levels.   

At PPG, we work every day to develop and deliver the paints, coatings and materials that our customers have trusted for 135 years. Through dedication and creativity, we solve our customers’ biggest challenges. We operate and innovate in more than 70 countries.
